opendial.datastructs.ValueRange

    • Uses of ValueRange in opendial.bn.distribs

      Methods in opendial.bn.distribs with parameters of type ValueRange 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Set<Value> ConditionalDistribution.getValues(ValueRange range)
      Returns all possible values specified in the table.
      default java.util.Set<Value> IndependentProbDistribution.getValues(ValueRange range)
      Returns the set of possible values for the distribution.
      java.util.Set<Value> MarginalDistribution.getValues(ValueRange range)
      Returns the possible values for X given the range of possible conditional values for Y1,...Yn.
      java.util.Set<Value> ProbDistribution.getValues(ValueRange range)
      Returns the set of possible values for the distribution, given a set of possible values for the conditional variables.

    • Uses of ValueRange in opendial.datastructs

      Methods in opendial.datastructs with parameters of type ValueRange 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ValueRange.addRange(ValueRange newRange)
      Adds the range of values to the existing one.
      void ValueRange.intersectRange(ValueRange otherRange)
      Intersects the range with the existing one (only retains the values defined in both ranges).
      Constructors in opendial.datastructs with parameters of type ValueRange 
      Constructor and Description
      ValueRange(ValueRange range1, ValueRange range2)
      Constructs a new range that is the union of two existing ranges

    • Uses of ValueRange in opendial.domains.rules

      Methods in opendial.domains.rules that return ValueRange 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ValueRange RuleCase.getGroundings(Assignment input)
      Returns the possible groundings for the case, based on the provided input assignment.

    • Uses of ValueRange in opendial.domains.rules.conditions

      Methods in opendial.domains.rules.conditions that return ValueRange 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ValueRange BasicCondition.getGroundings(Assignment input)
      Returns the set of possible groundings for the given input assignment
      ValueRange ComplexCondition.getGroundings(Assignment input)
      Returns the groundings for the complex condition (which is the union of the groundings for all basic conditions).
      ValueRange Condition.getGroundings(Assignment input)
      Returns the set of possible groundings derived from the condition, based on the given assignment.
      ValueRange NegatedCondition.getGroundings(Assignment input) 
      ValueRange TemplateCondition.getGroundings(Assignment input)
      Returns the set of possible groundings for the given input assignment
      ValueRange VoidCondition.getGroundings(Assignment input)
      Returns an empty set of groundings

    • Uses of ValueRange in opendial.state

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ValueRange AnchoredRule.getInputs()
      Returns the value range for the input variables
      ValueRange AnchoredRule.getOutputs()

    • Uses of ValueRange in opendial.state.distribs

      Methods in opendial.state.distribs with parameters of type ValueRange 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Set<Value> EquivalenceDistribution.getValues(ValueRange range)
      Returns a set of two assignments: one with the value true, and one with the value false.
      java.util.Set<Value> OutputDistribution.getValues(ValueRange range)
      Returns the possible outputs values given the input range in the parent nodes (probability rule nodes and previous version of the variable)
      java.util.Set<Value> RuleDistribution.getValues(ValueRange range)
      Returns the possible values for the rule.
